name: Falling With Style VR
description:
a VR sky diving game where player use the position of the controls to control the speed and direction in which they fall as they race to the finish line and obstacles. 9 levels, a score mode and randomly generated infinite fall mode, Players must avoid colliding with obstacles on the way down to hit a target, while flying through rings to earn points.

made in early 2020 as part of learning how to work with the oculus quest, so its not exactly super polished, but i enjoy it, was originally built with the oculus quest one in mind, but should work perfectly fine with oculus quest 2, and rift using the pc build
